000004  2c00              CMP      r4,#0

;;;38         WM_Obj *pWin;
;;;39         WM_LOCK();

;;;40         pWin = WM_HANDLE2PTR(hWin);  
00000c  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_ALLOC_h2p
000012  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;41         /* First check if this is necessary at all */
;;;42         if (pWin->Status & WM_SF_ISVIS) {
000014  8ba0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x1c]
000016  f0100f02          TST      r0,#2
00001a  d00a              BEQ      |L1.50|
;;;43           /* Mark content as invalid */
;;;44           WM__InvalidateRectEx(&pWin->Rect, pWin->hParent, pWin->hNext);
00001c  f9b4201a          LDRSH    r2,[r4,#0x1a]
000020  f9b41016          LDRSH    r1,[r4,#0x16]
000024  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000026  f7fffffe          BL       WM__InvalidateRectEx
;;;45           /* Clear Visibility flag */
;;;46           pWin->Status &= ~WM_SF_ISVIS;
00002a  8ba0              LDRH     r0,[r4,#0x1c]
00002c  f0200002          BIC      r0,r0,#2

;;;47           #if WM_SUPPORT_NOTIFY_VIS_CHANGED
;;;48             WM__SendMsgNoData(hWin, WM_NOTIFY_VIS_CHANGED);             /* Notify window that visibility may have changed */
;;;49           #endif
;;;50         }
;;;51         WM_UNLOCK();
